'''"As One Might Stride Betwixt the Clouds"''' is [[Lan Yan]]'s [[Level 1 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This Constellation doubles the number of hits from the Feathermoon Rings that Lan Yan throws.
** Although the description of [[Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance]] says that Lan Yan hurls her Feathermoon Rings, it seems that she actually only hurls one of them at Constellation Level 0, based on the description and behavior of this Constellation.
